%c[pda_white]Williams "Ashes" Heades%c[ui_gray_1] is a trader. He hangs around at the Book Store (Pripyat Outskirts).
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1]
 
Williams "Ashes" Heades is a member of the Mercenaries. Former UN soldier, he was sent to multiple theaters of war as part of UN task forces. He fought the civil war in the 2010 rebellion in Altis, Greece.
 
He was later sent to the Chornobyl exclusion zone as part of a special UNISG deployment. Not a lot is known about what he was tasked with, all that people know is he decided to stay and did not leave with the rest of the deployment.
 
%c[pda_yellow]Trivia%c[ui_gray_1]
 
• This trader is the main importer for western goods in the Zone.

%c[pda_white]GPS locator%c[ui_gray_1] is a device used to identify the distance and name to the closest area.
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1]
 
A military grade GPS device used to identify, and find the distance to the closest area near the user. It also displays the global region the user is located in.
 
A special technology is used for the screen of the device, allowing it to display information with very minimal power use. The downside of that is that the screen cannot display colors.
 
• %c[pda_white]Extremely low power consumption%c[ui_gray_1]. Needs recharging about once a year depending on use.

%c[pda_white]Captain Oleksandr Chernenko%c[ui_gray_1] is a trader. He can be found at the Flea Market (Garbage).
 
%c[pda_green]Information%c[ui_gray_1]
 
Captain Oleksandr Chernenko is a former Army soldier, turned Mercenary. He said he deserted when the army tasked him with a suicide mission, although little details are know about what this mission was, as he seems to not enjoy talking about it.
 
These days, he can be found in the basement of the Flea Market, at the Garbage. He offers packages of items, at a discount. The sale of these packages is usually limited in time.
 
%c[pda_yellow]Trivia%c[ui_gray_1]
 
• This trader manages the Mercenary's flea market offerings; 
• This trader can sometimes sell packages containing western goods.
